run amok.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to suddenly behave in a very violent and uncontrolled way
run amok.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Drunken troops ran amok in the town.
run amok.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to get out of control and cause a lot of problems
run amok.translation[0].definitions[1].e: an age in which global capitalism has run amok
